p: The experimental layout included three individual sowing and harvesting periods (pot cultures 1–3) of the sweet basil in one calendar year. These were following: pot culture 1 (23.3.–1.6. 2015 and 8.2.–25.4. 2016), pot culture 2 (27.4.–14.7. 2015 and 28.4.–20.6. 2016), pot culture 3 (1.9.–26.10. 2015 and 15.8.–17.10. 2016). The greenhouse experiments were carried out in 4 replications for each variety with 30 plants for each variant.
